title: California Firm Recalls Frozen Ground Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O157: H7 Contamination
summary: Editor's Note, August 18, 2010: This recall release is being amended to revise the geographic distribution and that some of the recalled products were distributed to a firm in California for further processing. WASHINGTON, August 6, 2010 - Valley Meat Company, a Modesto, Calif. establishment...
